name: Mesa Projectilyst Helmet
description: Mesa reimagined as the Sentients would have designed her.

languages.description: Mesa, so, wie die Sentients sie entworfen hätten.
languages.name: Mesa-Helm: Projectilyst

languages.description: Mesa réinventée comme les Sentients l'auraient conçue.
languages.name: Casque Mesa Projectilyste

languages.description: Mesa, se fosse stata progettata dai Sentient.
languages.name: Elmo Mesa Projectilyst

languages.description: 센티언트가 설계했을 만한 모습으로 재구상된 메사입니다.
languages.name: 메사 프로젝타일리스트 헬멧

languages.description: Mesa reinventada, como si la hubieran diseñado los conscientes.
languages.name: Casco Projectilyst de Mesa

languages.description: Mesa 被重新想象成 Sentient 所设计的样子。
languages.name: Mesa 投射使头盔

languages.description: Миса, в том виде, в котором её могли бы спроектировать Владеющие Разумом.
languages.name: Шлем Мисы: Прожектилист

languages.description: 設計を行ったのがセンティエントだと想定した場合のMesa。
languages.name: Mesa Projectilyst ヘルメット

languages.description: Uma recriação da Mesa como os Sentients a teriam projetado.
languages.name: Mesa: Capacete Projectilyst

languages.description: Mesa 的重構，倘若是 Sentient 設計了她。
languages.name: Mesa 投射使頭盔

languages.description: มโนภาพ Mesa ใหม่ราวกับว่าพวก Sentient ได้ออกแบบเธอ
languages.name: หมวกเหล็ก Mesa Projectilyst

languages.description: Mesa, Sentient'lerin onu tasarlayacağı şekilde yeniden şekillendi.
languages.name: Mesa Projectilyst Miğfer
